title: Parker Urban Fountain Pen, London Cab Black, Medium Nib with Blue Ink Refill (1931604),Black Cab
features: Passend zu Ihrem ganz persönlichen Stil
Die e, ziselierte Edelstahlfeder sorgt für ein sicheres und ganz persönliches Schreibgefühl
Durch die ergonomische Form und die Leichtigkeit und Balance liegt das Schreibgerät ganz Natürlich in der hand
Der Füllfederhalter ist ein Hochwertiges Geschenk für alle Gelegenheiten
description: Eye catching and dynamic, PARKER Urban Fountain Pens deliver a boldly modern look that dares to be noticed. With its curved silhouette, you enjoy a perfectly balanced writing experience that complements your style. This PARKER fountain pen features a refined pearl shine, satin varnish, chiseled metallic lines that echo the ergonomic form and eye-catching chrome trim. The durable nib is crafted from stainless steel and shaped to provide the optimal writing angle. For use with QUINK ink cartridges or convertible to ink bottle filling. Designed with flowing curves and available in a range of finishes, the fine pens inspire confidence behind every word.
